scripts.clean: find . \( -name node_modules -type d -o -name dev-dist -type d -o -name dist -type d -o -name html -type d -o -name playwright -type d -o -name playwright-report -type d -o -name playwright-test-results -type d -name pnpm-lock.json -type f \) | xargs rm -rf && pnpm install
scripts.dev:claims: rimraf dev-dist && DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa SW_DEV=true CLAIMS=true SW=true vite --force
scripts.dev:destroy: rimraf dev-dist && DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa SW_DEV=true SW_DESTROY=true vite --force
scripts.dev:claims-destroy: rimraf dev-dist && DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa SW_DEV=true CLAIMS=true SW_DESTROY=true SW=true vite --force
scripts.build:reloadsw: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true RELOAD_SW=true pnpm build-only
scripts.build:claims: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true CLAIMS=true pnpm build-only
scripts.build:reloadsw-claims: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true RELOAD_SW=true CLAIMS=true pnpm build-only
scripts.build:sw: rimraf dist && DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true pnpm build-only
scripts.build:sw-reloadsw: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true RELOAD_SW=true pnpm build-only
scripts.build:sw-claims: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true CLAIMS=true pnpm build-only
scripts.build:sw-reloadsw-claims: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true RELOAD_SW=true CLAIMS=true pnpm build-only
scripts.build:destroy: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW_DESTROY=true pnpm build-only
scripts.build:reloadsw-destroy: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true RELOAD_SW=true SW_DESTROY=true pnpm build-only
scripts.build:claims-destroy: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true CLAIMS=true SW_DESTROY=true pnpm build-only
scripts.build:reloadsw-claims-destroy: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true RELOAD_SW=true CLAIMS=true SW_DESTROY=true pnpm build-only
scripts.build:sw-destroy: rimraf dist && DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true SW_DESTROY=true pnpm build-only
scripts.build:sw-reloadsw-destroy: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true RELOAD_SW=true SW_DESTROY=true pnpm build-only
scripts.build:sw-claims-destroy: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true CLAIMS=true SW_DESTROY=true pnpm build-only
scripts.build:sw-reloadsw-claims-destroy: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true RELOAD_SW=true CLAIMS=true SW_DESTROY=true pnpm build-only
